articles.title: Syphilis: As majority of these cases are asymptomatic, here are a few medically relevant things you need to know about this STI - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: ​Syphilis is a common sexually transmitted infection caused by Treponema pallidum. As per the data released by the World Health Organisation (WHO), more than 7 million adults had syphilis in 2020. Though it is a preventable infection, in most of cases the sym…
